title: Sona legendary skin bug using /toggle at fountain in ARAM
body: Started an ARAM game , was using DJ sona skin, bought 1 item, usually buy a pot too, forgot to buy pot, used /toggle on the fountain, and it wouldn't let me buy the pot after that

replies.body: Ok after playing a lot more arams, this actually might be just a UI thing, you click on anything other than the item, and it seems there's a specific spot on the item to click, you can't buy it for some reason, maybe the UI needs a tweak to allow for a more allowable clicking area on the item you're trying to buy, will play around with this more tonight

Nope, you guys extended the range quite a bit, and i didn't step off the platform, i bought chalice, and tome, decided to go ahead and /toggle, went to buy a pot and it wouldn't let me.
Side note, some skills are acting wierd in general, some spells sucking you back in even if you've left radius, example would be victors field, maybe that's intended.  I'll try to post about those too, been playing a lot of aram lately

Hiya Jasteus,

Did you happen to step off the platform?

**EDIT:** I was able to purchase an item, use /toggle to swap forms, and then buy a pot.
